name: Jahid Hassan Shamim
bio: I am a Software Engineer Passionate about Database Design and API development and System Design by working in a collaborative environment with a flexible nature of adopting, learning and implementing new things to fulfill the project demands. Have a strong ambition to work in the larger scale projects by following good practices for making systems efficient.

experience.detail:
➢ working on a Backend System with Django and Django Rest Framework for a product according to the requirements.
 ➢  Implementing Different features and functionalities with real time updates by Websocket with Django Channels.
 ➢ Preparing custom script for Data serialization to restore NoSQL Data to Relational DB 
 ➢ Getting familiar with Site reliability with AWS EC2, S3 Bucket, RDS
➢ Collaborated on existing ERP system projects by Preparing necessary methods, write SQL queries for preparing report to manage and evaluate sales force activity.

➢ Worked on 4 different project that are built with Flutter like content management app, Book app with Google book API for Readers community, PDF reader app with note taking and PDF creation functionality with an experience of app publishing in play store and implementing referral points allocation on sharing
 ➢ Familiarized with Backend Development by Collaborating on 2 Backend projects where implemented Custom Admin panel with wagtail CMS,database design, API development, Data serialization, Background task setup with Cronjob, Securing APIs with APIKey

➢ During Internship period worked on Learning Flutter, Firebase and Riverpod as a State Management tool. 
 ➢ Collaborated in the existing project built by Flutter

➢ Worked on Doctor and Patient portal (Personal Profiling for doctor and patient) for managing appointments and Chambers.
➢ Designing the user Interface and Integrated all APIs based on requirements.
